attributes.action: No to the New World Order
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: General public to have more power in what happens around the world in all aspects, remove power from people ruling the government. More power to Local Council Offices.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
